      public void addProduct​(java.lang.String[] products)

    • resizeColumnWidth

      public int resizeColumnWidth​(javax.swing.JTable table)
      Used to make the table cells fit the inside text
      Parameters:
      table - the table to be fitted
      Returns:
      the final total width of the table Source: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/17627431/auto-resizing-the-jtable-column-widths

    • showAll

      public void showAll​(java.lang.String[][] data)
      Displays in the operation panel a table with all the orders
      Parameters:
      data - A matrix of data. A row corresponds to a single order and the columns correspond to the known order details
